summary:
Replace the skyrim logo with a beautiful khajiit wallpaper <3
Best version here -> https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89446/
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][color=#d8d8d8][size=4]Do you get bored with the Skyrim logo every time you enter the game? Are you a fan of the khajiits ?, you came to the right place, this mod replaces the skyrim logo with a beautiful khajiit wallpaper!.[/size][/color][/center][center]
[size=5] [color=#9900ff]﻿[/color] [color=#9900ff]﻿[/color][color=#ffff00]NEW VERSION [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89446/]HERE[/url]﻿[/color]
[color=#9900ff]====================================================================================[/color][/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]All credits to the creator of the fabulous image!
[/size][/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/35431/?tab=about+me][size=4]Eiries[/size][/url][size=4]﻿<-Autor[/size]


[color=#ff0000][size=4]>[/size][/color][size=3]I can bring more wallpapers in the future if I see support, just say it in the comments![/size][size=4][color=#ff0000]<[/color]
[color=#000000]I recommend using this mod with: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7901]No Menu and Loading Smoke[/url]﻿[/color]
[color=#ff0000]>>>I'm not sure if this mod has support for all screen resolutions, say it in the comments<<<[/color][/size]
[img]https://wallup.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/118693-The_Elder_Scrolls_V_Skyrim-Khajiit-blood-artwork.jpg[/img]

[color=#ff7700][size=5]more love towards the khajiit's!!﻿!![/size][/color][/center]
author: Draco
